name: will
marvin's will
will.desc: The will left to you by your great-grandfather Marvin.

name: lion hook
lion_hook.desc: its a hook with a lion's head

name: piano
grand piano
piano.desc: A grand piano with polished mahogany finish. A piano bench is stowed under the keyboard

name: piano bench
piano_bench.desc: A deluxe black cushioned bench meant to be used to play piano. There is a button on one side slightly below the cushion.

name: film reel
film
film_reel.desc: A film rolled on a reel that goes on a projector

name: master_bedroom_key
master_bedroom_key.desc: A dark red key with a lion's head engraved on the key handle

name: vase
vase.desc: A plain white vase with a crack on one side of the lip. It looks old and about to shatter.

name: piano bench doodle
doodle
doodle of piano bench
piano_bench_doodle.desc: A small piece of paper with a doodle drawing of a piano bench

name: cue stick
cue_stick.desc: A cue stick that's used to play billiards or pool

name: pool table
billiards table
pool_table.desc: A large billiards table, complete with red felt top under a hanging light. The table is bare except for one cue stick placed in the middle

name: projector
film projector
movie projector
projector.desc: A film projector with two spools and lens pointed at the giant projection screen.

name: ladder
ladder.desc: A bookshelf ladder that is tall enough to reach the ceiling and top shelf. A closer look shows that in can be unfolded into four legs to stand on its own.

name: master bed
master_bed.desc: A king sized bed fitted with silken sheets. It looks extremely comfortable.

name: nightstand
nightstand.desc: An elegant oak nightstand sits besides the bed. There appears to be a book on top.

name: 'The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe'
book
narnia_book.desc: The first of the 'Chronicles of Narnia' series. A bookmark sits on page 95.

name: computer
pc.desc: A video game appears to be running in the background.

name: album
album.desc: An album containing family photos. There appears to be a note wedged into the binding.
